multiselect.summary: Select multiple input values from a list of items

multisuggest.summary: Auto completion for entering multiple input values, designed for tag entry

placeholder.summary: Placeholder support for browsers with no native placeholder support.

popover.summary: An overlay that appears next to the element its assiated element.

slideshow.summary: Converts a list of items into a scrollable series of slides.

timepicker.summary: Simple timepicker that support 12 and 24 hour formats
